Uses of Package
org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature

  • Packages that use org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature
    Package for helper classes over features such as ObjectHistogram or FeatureMeta.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest
    Contains random forest implementation classes.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data
    Package contains helper data structures for random forest implementation.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity
    Contains implementation of impurity computers based on histograms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.statistics
    Contains implementation of statistics computers for Random Forest.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature used by org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature 
    Class and Description
    DistributionComputer
    Interface specifies an object that can compute some discrete distribution.
    FeatureMeta
    Feature meta class.
    Histogram
    Interface of histogram over type T.
    ObjectHistogram
    Basic implementation of Histogram that implements also DistributionComputer.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature used by org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest 
    Class and Description
    FeatureMeta
    Feature meta class.
    ObjectHistogram
    Basic implementation of Histogram that implements also DistributionComputer.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature used by org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data 
    Class and Description
    FeatureMeta
    Feature meta class.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature used by org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity 
    Class and Description
    BucketMeta
    Bucket meta-information for feature histogram.
    Histogram
    Interface of histogram over type T.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature used by org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.statistics 
    Class and Description
    FeatureMeta
    Feature meta class.
    ObjectHistogram
    Basic implementation of Histogram that implements also DistributionComputer.
